topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54db7ebf6368725113c00400#post_54db7ebf6368725113c00400
Her special talent is Oneiromancy. If you don't know what that is, it's basically what princess Luna does to little foals in their sleep.

The idea i had for her is that she can only fully use her magic when she's asleep. When she's awake she can barely levitate a teacup, but in her sleep she can fuck with ponies' dreams pretty much however she wants.
Because of that, she spends a lot of her time sleeping, often neglecting to take care of herself. That's why she looks so gaunt.
